thread.title: South Africa’s Market Is Mirroring China’s Stock Selloff

author: Ese Erheriene
title: South Africa’s Market Is Mirroring China’s Stock Selloff
text:
A key to successful investing is correctly predicting how news affecting one part of the market will impact others. For example, is a company warning about its own results good or bad for shares of rivals? At the moment, investors are betting that continuing U.S. protectionist trade actions, aimed chiefly at China, aren’t good for […]
  WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Trading Desks, China, Ellison Next OPEC Says Its Oil Flows Fell in March—Energy Journal
